titleInfo.title: FALEOMAVAEGA ENI FA'AUA'A HUNKIN VA CLINIC

extension.searchTitle: FALEOMAVAEGA ENI FA'AUA'A HUNKIN VA CLINIC; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 39

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Naming the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Pago Pago, American Samoa, the Faleomavaega Eni Fa'aua'a Hunkin VA Clinic
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 1362, to name the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Pago Pago, American Samoa, the Faleomavaega Eni Fa'aua'a Hunkin VA Clinic, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 411 yeas to 2 nays, Roll No. 127;

titleInfo.title: NOTICE OF INTENTION TO OFFER RESOLUTION RAISING A QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE

extension.searchTitle: NOTICE OF INTENTION TO OFFER RESOLUTION RAISING A QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 39

congVote.result: So the motion to table was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Representative Eshoo rose to a question of the privileges of the House and submitted a resolution. The Chair ruled that the resolution did not present a question of the privileges of the House. Subsequently, Representative Eshoo appealed the ruling of the chair and Representative McCarthy moved to table the appeal. Agreed to the motion to table the appeal of the ruling of the Chair by a recorded vote of 227 ayes to 186 noes with 1 answering ``present'', Roll No. 128.

extension.searchTitle: DISAPPROVING A RULE SUBMITTED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR-- Continued; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 39

congVote.result: The joint resolution (H.J. Res. 44) was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Federal Land Policy and Management Act Rule
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: <P/>By 51 yeas to 48 nays (Vote No. 82), Senate passed H.J. Res. 44, disapproving the rule submitted by the Department of the Interior relating to Bureau of Land Management regulations that establish the procedures used to prepare, revise, or amend land use plans pursuant to the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976.
